events.long_desc: Remember snakes and ladders? Wanna live through it in the real world? Then Static Rush is your ultimate platform with a twist of electronics. With unlimited adventure and enthralling fun packed in every step you take, this one game will make you remember your childhood and with electronics embedded this one event is surely gonna be in your good books.
events.short_desc: Remember snakes and ladders? Wanna live through it in the real world? Then Static Rush is your ultimate platform with a twist of electronics. With unlimited adventure and enthralling fun packed in every step you take, this one game will make you remember your childhood and with electronics embedded this one event is surely gonna be in your good books.

events.long_desc:
Staring at the night skies, have you ever wondered how big the universe is? What lies in the
event horizon of the black hole? What binds the smallest masses so closely? Where and when
did it all began?
If these questions tickle you, then fasten up your seatbelts and get ready. Because Anweshaâ€™19
brings to you â€œAstroParticle Voyageâ€.
An intense quizzing event for the knuckle-heads.
So get ready to dive deep into the mysteries of the universe. Because the ride is about to begin.
events.short_desc: Are you an astronomy or particle physics enthusiast?

events.long_desc:
You need to convert a simple plastic bottle into a rocket which can be fired through the rocket
launcher (which will be provided) into the sky reaching weapon of mass destruction.
events.short_desc: Ever wondered what is the science behind rocket propulsion? What if I say you can build a rocket and learn it yourself.

events.long_desc: If you are the one tapping your foot to music and stealing the show with your moves, this one is for you! Burst upon the stage with all your energy, skill, elegance and style. Dance to the rhythm of your heart, dance like no one is watching!
events.short_desc: If you are the one tapping your foot to music and stealing the show with your moves, this one is for you!

events.long_desc:
Are you the magician who can find any hidden treasure, however difficult be your journey is? Are you ready the exploit the grey matter inside you? If so, Then you should never be going to miss this carnival hunt!!!

Here we bring to you another edition of your favorite Online Treasure Hunt, NJATH, where you read, analyze, hunt, solve, decipher, decode and struggle endlessly for what you have not found you need. But mind it, this journey will not be easy. Well, if the treasure is precious, so it would be strenuous to reach, guarded with brain-storming summons.

Think Dream and hunt. Well, this is the hunt of a lifetime, adventure extraordinaire, because this is Not Just Another Treasure Hunt.

The ultimate hunt begins at 9:00pm on 25th January and will end at 11:59pm on 27th January.
events.organisers:
PIYUSH CHAUHAN (9673582517)
PRIYANSH SINGH RAO  (8058501770)
BHAVANI SUSMITHA (9123519137)

events.long_desc: Learn to build, build to fight, and fight to win!! It is time to test the coordination between speed, power and strategy ... this is the war of machines.
events.short_desc: Excited about robots!!

events.long_desc:
Life is like SOCCER ,IN THE END we all need GOALS.
Done with fierce battle of  bots on the land?
 Then, AQUA-SOCCER brings you the opportunity to wakeboard your  technical skills and creativity in order to score some of the most exciting GOALS of your life.
events.short_desc: Football and Water fits well during rain how will it fit while doing the same on the water surface with little bit of a Technical touch.

events.long_desc:
What makes a Structure to stand still?? Cement,Bricks,Designâ€¦NO!!!!!!!!!!!!
Passion â€¦.
Passion to carve , passion to imagine, passion to desire, passion to build and passion to dream.
Passion can even make a card structure stand till eternity, so why not try your passion. This Anwesha come and showcase your talent and win exclusive prizes and enhance your passion.

events.long_desc:
MAIDAAN E JUNG , the street play competition presented by Anwesha gives a fillip to your
zeal and enthusiasm, as you display your knack of molding and redefining social
perceptions and ideology ... Clear your throats, and send the Dholaks beating! Send your
message right across- loud and clear!

events.long_desc:
Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
-Peter Ustinov

We have all been afraid of making a joke out of ourselves. But have you ever thought about turning that joke around to make people laugh as they cheer you on?

If not, come forth, grab the mike, for Anwesha 19 brings you a stage of grandeur where the battle to become Mr.Gigglers rages on!

Participants need to send a 3-4 minute video clip of their performance uploaded on google drive with personal details and Anwesha id to events.anwesha19@gmail.com with the subject Mr. Gigglers
events.short_desc:
Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
-Peter Ustinov

events.long_desc:
Survivors are not always the strongest; sometimes they are the smartest, but more often
simply the luckiest.
But how will you know that you are fortuitous enough????
Brace yourselves because you might need to put aside your moral, virtues, ego and jump
into the arena.
So wait with baited breath for the spectacle is about to unfold. This ANWESHA 18 , you
will have to beg your luck, borrow your courage and steal the fame.
events.short_desc:
This ANWESHA 18 , you
will have to beg your luck, borrow your courage and steal the fame.

events.long_desc: Come to the wonderland of games and fun. A lot of activities and games to participate and win. Try your luck in the FUN ZONE to win big. Come with your friends and show everyone your skills and maybe get lucky enough to win some amazing goodies. Also join in the fun that is Anwesha to gain some amazing memories to cherish.
events.short_desc: Come to the wonderland of games and fun. A lot of activities and games to participate and win. Try your luck in the FUN ZONE to win big. Come with your friends and show everyone your skills and maybe get lucky enough to win some amazing goodies. Also join in the fun that is Anwesha to gain some amazing memories to cherish.

events.long_desc:
The time has come to explore the treasure buried deep inside you and to share the coins of amusement and gems of laughter with everyone.
Are you the witty boy of the group who delivers unexpected punchlines at the right moment?
Then it&amp;amp;#039;s your turn to make the silent pictures speak a message in a most humorous way.
To make a meme after seeing which reader
will find it hard to scroll down without sharing it with someone.
It&amp;amp;#039;s time to take out your mobiles and laptops, to get your brain into gear and get set ready for #Memiyapa.
Take out your Meme guns lads, the war is about to start !!

Send your entries to - events.anwesha19@gmail.com
with &amp;amp;quot;Memiyapa entry&amp;amp;quot; as the subject. Along with your details such as Name, ANWESHA-ID, College-name, Phone number, Address.

The time has come to explore the treasure buried deep inside you and to share the coins of amusement and gems of laughter with everyone.
To make a meme after seeing which reader
will find it hard to scroll down without sharing it with someone.
It&amp;amp;#039;s time to take out your mobiles and laptops, to get your brain into gear and get set ready for #Memiyapa.

events.long_desc:
What lies behind that photographic frame splendid in its grandeur despite some speckles of dust that fail to wane its sheen?
Not just a moment but almost a time!
Sometimes despair, sometimes ecstacy,
Sometimes silence, Sometimes a revolution!
Sometimes greed, sometimes love,
Sometimes color, sometimes its absence,
Sometimes Evil, But &amp;#039;always&amp;#039; Beauty!

Anwesha presents to you, &amp;#039;CliXX&amp;#039;, an online photography competition. Send us some of the scents that you bottled up, and win exciting prizes.

The theme is &amp;quot;MACRO PHOTOGRAPHY&amp;quot;

Though every picture speaks a thousand words, Send your entries on events.anwesha19@gmail.com with a caption to embellish it!
events.short_desc:
What lies behind that photographic frame splendid in its grandeur despite some speckles of dust that fail to wane its sheen?
Not just a moment but almost a time!
Sometimes despair, sometimes ecstacy,
Sometimes silence, Sometimes a revolution!

events.long_desc:
Rangoli making is joy,
When you watch the silent Poetry,
Smiling on the floor,
And speaking of a lovely story, of emotions mixed,
You would feel as if, you have found a treasure,
A treasure of wealth and a way to pleasure.
Lauding the decorative folk art of Rangoli , an immense part of Indian Culture.
ANWESHA 18 invites you to compose a poetry on floor with shapes and colours of your
insight.
events.short_desc:
ANWESHA 18 invites you to compose a poetry on floor with shapes and colours of your
insight.

events.long_desc:
A cat has nine lives, you have just one in this world. Play havoc on the controllers with your fingers, glue your eyes to the screen and play the anthem of a never-say-die hard-core gamer in your mind. It is time to aim, shoot and go in lock, stock and two smoking barrels
The Bombs have been planted, the lich king has risen, the bell tolls in the distance. It is pure pandemonium because it is time for ARMAGEDDON and this time the four horsemen are CS:GO, NFS , FIFA and DOTA 2. If you think you can survive. Come put your skills to the test. Glory awaits you.
events.short_desc: If you think you can survive. Come put your skills to the test. Glory awaits you.

events.long_desc:
Inside the most conservative person, a hidden wild child is wanting to come out to play,wish to live life of others so get started with the poly-juice potion.
The wizards are giving a chance to adorn yourself using our materials, metamorphose
your teammates and yourself into anybody 
you wanna be. So reckon your face as canvas and commence the painting.
events.short_desc: Inside the most conservative person, a hidden wild child is wanting to come out to play,wish to live life of others so get started with the poly-juice potion.

events.long_desc: Every Eiffel Tower was once just a model on a table, and every Burj Khalifa was nothing but a wisp of thought. This event is your opportunity to let your creative instincts take the reign. Craft the skyscrapers of tomorrow, let your vision take shape in ice-cream sticks and paint, and let the building of your dreams come true in your hands. Build a new horizon!
events.short_desc:
This world is nothing but a canvas to our imagination.
- Henry David Thoreau

events.long_desc:
Fashion is in the sky, in the street. It has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is
happening
Team Anwesha 2018 presents you VERVE-The Fashion Show, an opportunity to witness
glamour and style set the stage on fire.
The show will have all the ingredients for a sizzling night, handsome gents and beautiful
damsels dressed in attires ranging from breath-taking to outrageous which might sweep you
off your feet.
So this Verve, let creativity, fashion and glamour defy all earthly constraints as you take it
out of the world.
events.short_desc:
Fashion is in the sky, in the street. It has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is
happening
Team Anwesha 2018 presents you VERVE-The Fashion Show

events.long_desc: For ages we have carved for that voice that has the beauty of strength and freedom, the cruel beauty of loneliness of pain and disappointment and the everlasting beauty of unsatisfied love. If you think you have it in you, don&amp;amp;#039;t hold back .For once, let the music do the talking as the world converges on you.

events.long_desc:
Illuminance of stars has unleashed the sky and air thwart, feel the riffs and grunts and let your hearts pick up your soul.
The lights are on, the stage is set, the smoke is rippling through and the crowd is in a frenzy. Step down on the distortion pedals. Paint the black and white keys with the colour of your music. Feel the magic of music in the air, breathe in it. Every band has its day; and this one might just be yours!
events.short_desc: Illuminance of stars has unleashed the sky and air thwart, feel the riffs and grunts and let your hearts pick up your soul.

events.long_desc:
Are you Young and Dynamic?
Is your style statement electrifying and dashing?
Can your intellect impress people?
Think you have a complete, perfectly balanced personality?
The titles Mr and Ms Anwesha 19 await you!
IIT Patna and Anwesha 19 gives you a chance to present yourself at MrandMsAnwesha 19

with Mr and Ms Anwesha Entry as the subject. Along with your details such as Name, ANWESHA-ID, College-name, Phone number, Address, and a small write-up about yourself.

events.long_desc:
People have forgotten how to tell a story. Stories do not have a middle or an end any more. They usually have a beginning that never stops beginning.
â€“Steven Spielberg

We present to you as part of Anwesha 19, an opportunity for you to show the masses, the world through your camera, the world as you see it. We bring to you TAKE 22 Action!!!

The theme is - Passionate Love . Send your entries on events.anwesha19@gmail.com with a tittle to bedeck it!
events.short_desc:

events.long_desc: Painting is a silent poetry because a picture speaks volumes. As kids we were refrained from painting on walls, even scolded at times, but not anymore. Here&amp;amp;amp;amp;#039;s your chance to paint your imagination not on canvas but on walls. Come show your colors on Darpan - the wall painting competition.
events.short_desc: Wall painting Competition

events.long_desc: Because every picture has a story to tell.A picture tells you a thousand stories. Use visualization as a way to get creative with writing by looking at an interesting picture that will spark your curiosity and imagination. Come up with words to describe different parts of the picture to take these visualizations and turn them into a sentence and, eventually, a longer piece of writing.
events.short_desc: Use visualization as a way to get creative with writing by looking at an interesting picture that will spark your curiosity and imagination

events.long_desc:
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
To test your mind&amp;amp;amp; flexibility, Anwesha 2k18 brings you MINDBENDERS. This is an exhilarating, mind bending quiz, where you dont require any bookish knowledge as the  questions will be based on logical reasoning, analytical thinking etc
events.short_desc: To test your mind&amp;amp;amp; flexibility, Anwesha 2k18 brings you MINDBENDERS

events.long_desc:
Millions of products, thousands of brands, so many choices but one question in mind of every customer.
 Why shall I buy your products? 
Answer to this question lies in your ability to sell. 

In this fast paced world, where everything is just a click away, your chances of survival depends on how well you sell yourself. 

Is your mind full of catch-phrases and slogans? Can you convince others by the magic of your words? Are you the one who can sell the impossible?

Then here is your chance. Vendre, an online ad making competition. Pick up your camera and start filming your mind jamming ads.

Send us your entries as link of your ad uploaded on google drive at : events.anwesha19@gmail.com with title  Vendre  along with your personal details and Anwesha id(s).
events.short_desc: Online Ad-Making Competition

events.long_desc: GREAT LITERATURE IS SIMPLE LANGUAGE  CHARGED WITH  THE MEANING OF UTMOST   POSSIBLE DEGREE - great words by great people which are very useful in life.
events.short_desc: Literary Event

events.long_desc:
Whether it starts from black-white films of Kishore Kumar or the fascinating Movies of Bhai.
The slow and soothing step of 80&amp;amp;#039;s or the the vibrating hip-hops.
Here we bring to test your compassion and Love for Movies through our event
events.short_desc: Here we bring to test your compassion and Love for Movies through our event

events.long_desc:
Bible says - We are the clay, you are the potter; we are all the work of your hand. 
This Anwesha gives you a chance to switch sides and get the talismanic touch in your hands. Come....Mould....and let your ideas take shape.

events.long_desc:
Everyone has a habit of remembering things.Are you talented in it? If yes then you must be trying to prove it somehow because who don't want to prove and showcase their talent ?That too in an event which gives tons of fun along with it.
If you are searching for such sort of a thing then you are in the right way. Anwesha, the annual techno-cultural fest of IIT PATNA brings you an event MINUTE TO WIN IT, which has outcome of fun with talent. Just take a minute to know it now.
events.short_desc: Everyone has a habit of remembering things.Are you talented in it?

events.long_desc:
Want to feel the thrill of working behind the yellow tapes, solving a mind bending murder mystery?  Are you capable of becoming the new face of justice?
Anwesha19 brings to you, Virtual CID. A simulation of original crime scenes, with a problem statement to solve.
Do you think you can catch the culprit?
Then register yourself today cuz Justice is best served fast.

events.long_desc:
Model United Nations, also known as MUN, is an educational simulation and/or academic activity in which students can learn aboutÂ diplomacy,Â international relations, and theÂ United Nations. MUN involves and teaches participants researching, public speaking, debating, and writing skills, in addition toÂ critical thinking, teamwork, andÂ leadershipÂ abilities.
This is the second MUN of IIT Patna. We will only be organising the UNGA this year. The agenda for the same is - Observance of environmental norms in the drafting and implementation of agreements on disarmament and arms control.
We hope to see you there. 
This is not the G8, it is not the G20, this is the IITP MUN.
events.short_desc: Model United Nations, also known as MUN, is an educational simulation and/or academic activity in which students can learn aboutÂ diplomacy,Â international relations, and theÂ United Nations

events.long_desc:
Summon your grey matter and sharpen your memories, Anwesha present&amp;amp;amp;#039;s you it&amp;amp;amp;#039;s mega quizzing event &amp;amp;amp;quot;ULTIMATE SOCIAL BEING&amp;amp;amp;quot;. Ahead of lectures, this quiz is all about the world of arts, culture and sports. If you believe your memory can recall or search anything from the The Big Bang to Black Holes, from origins to posthumous. So just tie your shoes, log into various social network websites and have fun along with the chance to win prizes.

There will be 3 rounds on every consecutive day starting from 11 January, 2019. Questions will be posted through Anwesha facebook page.
events.short_desc: Summon your grey matter and sharpen your memories, Anwesha presents before you its mega quizzing event - Ultimate Social Being. Ahead of lectures, this quiz is all about the world of arts, culture and sports.

events.long_desc:
Ever came across a line that gave you a story of the lifetime?
An ambedo of memories, long lost love, a beautiful dream. Anwesha gives you an opportunity to express this emotion, a story which speaks for itself - Tale-e-graphy. In this competition, all you have to do is to frame a beautiful story in at most 1000 words, no language barrier.

The theme is &amp;amp;amp;quot;The Impeccable Showman&amp;amp;amp;#039;s Odyssey&amp;amp;amp;quot;

Send your entries to - events.anwesha19@gmail.com
with &amp;amp;amp;quot;Tale-E-Graphy entry&amp;amp;amp;quot; as the subject. Along with your details such as Name, ANWESHA-ID, College-name, Phone number, Address.
events.short_desc: Anwesha gives you an opportunity to express this emotion, a story which speaks for itself - Tale-e-graphy. In this competition, all you have to do is to frame a beautiful story in at most 1000 words, no language barrier.
